title: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
subtext: Simple algorithm for classification and regression
author: Buzzpy

description.title: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
texts: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) is a non-parametric algorithm used for classification and regression. It works by finding the closest training examples in the feature space to a given data point.
KNN is popular due to its simplicity and effectiveness, particularly in cases where the decision boundary is not well-defined.
